East.description: The forest extends eastward. You see a puddle on the ground.

South.description: The forest extends southward.

rooms.name: A Puddle in the Twisted Forest
rooms.description: Brambles and close trees prevent passage in any direction but west.  The ground's slick with moisture, but devoid of leaves or detritus or any other signs of inhabitation.  The darkness seems overwhelming.

West.description: The forest extends westward, ending at a thorny wall.

rooms.name: The Twisted Forest
rooms.description: Gnarled little misshapen trees crowd close together, their leafless branches blocking out the light overhead.  The barren ground at your feet seems to be lifeless, and there don't seem to be many signs of animals around here.  To the north and west, a fierce-looking bramble patch prevents passage.  A weird blue mist seems to curl around those thorns, but something about them seems to caution against investigating them too closely.

North.description: The forest extends northward.

West.description: The forest ends to the west.

rooms.name: The End of the Twisted Forest
rooms.description: Somber, badly blackened trees, warped so much that is difficult to tell what kind of trees they are, let alone their ages, reach out to strangle and catch you as you pass, plucking at clothing and armor.  An eerie blue mist rises up from the ground and curls around the trees' misshapen limbs, forming an impenetrable wall to the north, south, and west.

East.description: The only visible way out of here is to the east.

rooms.name: The Twisted Forest
rooms.description: Gnarled little misshapen trees crowd close together, their leafless branches blocking out the light overhead.  The barren ground at your feet seems to be lifeless, and there don't seem to be many signs of animals around here. Northward, you can see some rather large trees through the thick branches of the trees.

East.description: The forest extends eastward.

South.description: The forest extends southward.

West.description: The forest extends westward. It appears to end close by.

rooms.name: The Twisted Forest
rooms.description: A weird blue mist curls up from the black bramble bushes forming a wall on the western edge of this forest.  The evil-looking trees are slick with some kind of moisture, and their barren branches reach out for you...

North.description: The forest ends to the north.

East.description: The forest extends eastward.

rooms.name: A Bramble Patch
rooms.description: Some very dense thornbushes cluster to the north and west, forming an inpenetrable barrier.  The evil forms of malevolent trees lock tightly together, as if trying to capture unwary adventurers walking through this bramble patch.  The ground is slippery, making it difficult to maintain balance.

East.description: The patch extends westward a bit, where it seems to end.

South.description: The Twisted Forest looms ahead...

rooms.name: A Bramble Patch
rooms.description: Some extremely thick, evil, and sharp thorns adorn this bramble patch, which seems to serve as a wall of some kind, preventing any passage to the south or east.  Some huge trees stand to the north, beside some sort of structure to the northeast.

West.description: The patch extends west a bit, where it seems to end.

rooms.name: The Twisted Forest
rooms.description: This obscenely malevolent forest is composed of the most gnarled and misshapen trees you've ever seen.  There appears to be some fire damage to the trees' trunks, but there aren't any signs or scents of a fire anytime recently. Oddly, none of the branches in sight seem to have any leaves.

North.description: The forest extends northward, tapering off in front of some absolutely huge trees.

West.description: The forest extends westward.

rooms.name: The Twisted Forest
rooms.description: This obscenely malevolent forest is composed of the most gnarled and misshapen trees you've ever seen.  There appears to be some fire damage to the trees' trunks, but there aren't any signs or scents of a fire anytime recently. Oddly, none of the branches in sight seem to have any leaves.

South.description: The forest extends southward.

rooms.name: Before the Rhell Trees
rooms.description: This mighty tree has very rough, slightly rust-colored bark.  It seems almost wise, in a way, as if it were the keeper of the forest.  To the north is a very old and slightly decrepit house that has seen many better days.  You can only see the moss-stained white walls from behind this tree.  A huge forest looms to the south, obscured in part by thorn bushes.

East.description: A pleasant little garden path lies eastward.

West.description: More of the huge trees lie westward.

Up.description: You can climb up on one of the largest trees' trunks.

rooms.name: Before the Rhell Trees
rooms.description: This tree's rough trunk is so wide it'd take three people holding hands to encompass its girth.  It's so tall you can't see the top of it.  It's so old it looks like it's been here since long before humans arrived.  To the north, you can see a very old house, and to the south, thorn bushes obscure a huge black forest.

East.description: More of the trees stand eastward.

Up.description: You can climb up the trunk of one of the largest trees.

rooms.name: Before the Rhell Trees
rooms.description: Around this huge tree is silence, but it's a respectful silence, not the eerie, malevolent silence that most of this huge black forest seems to have. The tree's rough trunk is absolutely the widest one you've ever seen, and you can't even tell how tall it is.  To the north, you can see the outer walls of a decaying building, while, to the south, the black forest looms behind an impenetrable wall of thorns.

Up.description: You can climb up the trunk of one of the large trees.

rooms.name: Before the Rhell Trees
rooms.description: This huge gallery of immense trees stretches far to the north.  All around them, ferns grow, and respectful silence reigns.  To the south, you can see a pathway disappearing into a black, evil-looking forest.  To the northeast, you can see a decaying structure of some sort.

North.description: More of the rhells lie northward.

Up.description: You can climb up the trunk of one of the gigantic trees.

rooms.name: Before the Rhell Trees
rooms.description: This gallery of huge trees stretches to the north and south a ways.  Each of the three huge trees is mind-bogglingly large, with trunks of immense girth, and whose tops can't be seen from the ground.  Soft green ferns grow at each tree's base.  Far away, to the south, you can see thorn bushes and evil, smaller black trees, while to the east, you can see the stained west wall of some kind of building.

North.description: More of the giants lie northward.

South.description: More of the rhell trees lie southward, and from there, the forest...

Up.description: You can climb up the rhell tree's trunk.

rooms.name: Before the Rhell Trees
rooms.description: This gallery of trees seems much different from the other parts of the Twisted Forest.  For one thing, these trees are bigger, and their trunks are tall and proud and straight -- and huge in diameter.  You can't see the tops of any of them, so high do they stretch.  A sort of respectful silence reigns here.

South.description: More of the large trees lies southward.

Up.description: You can climb up the rhell tree.

rooms.name: Before the Rhell Trees
rooms.description: You find yourself in a north-south stretching grove of the biggest trees you've ever seen in your life.  It's very quiet around here, but it's not a threatening silence..  Or is it?

South.description: More of the huge trees lie southward.

Up.description: You can climb up the trunk of the largest of the trees.

rooms.name: Before the Rhell Trees
rooms.description: Huge, rough-trunked trees form a north-south line along a natural ridge in the ground, preventing any kind of westward passage.  The trees are giants, with branches stretching far above your head.

North.description: More gigantic rhell trees lie northward.

South.description: More of the huge trees stand southward.

Up.description: You can climb up on one of the trunks of the larger rhell trees.

rooms.name: Before the Rhell Trees
rooms.description: This is a gallery of huge trees stretching off to the north from here.  Any of these trees could easily make a dozen houses, you're sure; they're absolutely huge.  They don't resemble the other trees of the forest, the small, twisted, blackened, malevolent ones that taunt you...  These seem much more peaceful.

North.description: A few more of the large trees stand to the north, in a line.

Up.description: You can climb up on the trunk of the largest rhell tree.

rooms.name: A Garden Path
rooms.description: Once, this might have been a beautiful garden path.  Now, however, it's decrepit and ruined.  No flowers grow along the slippery rocks leading northward.  No human hands have disturbed this place in what must be decades. To the west, the path disappears among huge trees.

North.description: The path ends to the north, at a door.

West.description: You see a stand of rhell trees to the west.

rooms.name: The Gamekeeper's Front Door
rooms.description: A garden path to the south leads up here, to what is clearly some kind of doorstep.  The stone steps leading up to the immense wooden door have long ago broken down, forcing you to scramble past rubble.

South.description: You see a little garden path that curves out of sight.

West.description: The front door appears to be securely locked.

extras.text: The door's made of thick blackened wood. At some point in the past, it must have been set on fire, but it still seems strong.

rooms.name: Inside the Gamekeeper's Abode
rooms.description: A quiet hallway leads off to the west before curving out of sight.  You've never seen such a creepy place.  Moss grows up the walls, tree roots stick up out of the floor, and it smells awful.

East.description: The sturdy wooden door leads outside.

West.description: The dark halls beckon you further.

rooms.name: The Halls of the Gamekeeper
rooms.description: You walk down a dark hallway.  Once it might have been carpeted, but the carpet long ago decayed into a fine brown-gold dust sprinkled among many roots that protrude from under the floor.  The moss on the walls gives this hall a decrepit look, though you can tell that at one time it must have been grand.

East.description: You see a foyer to the east, and a thick wooden door.

West.description: The hall extends northward. You see only dim outlines.

rooms.name: A Trophy Hall
rooms.description: The hall makes a turn here, heading off to the north and east.  This is obviously some sort of social gathering-place, judging from the many chairs and tables scattered about.  All of the furnishings appear very old, but only some of them are covered in dust.  Others seem clean.  The walls are adorned with numerous hunting trophies: animal heads, stuffed sharks, and various monsters posed as if still alive.

North.description: The hall continues. You see dim outlines only.

East.description: A hall runs off to the east.

rooms.name: The Center of the Trophy Hall
rooms.description: A fine brown-gold mist covers the floor, which is almost completely drowned in dirt and tree roots.  But it's easy to see footprints in that dust.  You pass chairs and tables that appear old and decrepit, but notice that not all of them are covered in dust.  Hunting trophies cover the west wall, making this place seem alive somehow.

North.description: The hall curves off to the east just ahead.

South.description: The hall continues. It curves further on.

rooms.name: The Trophy Hall
rooms.description: A wide hall makes a sharp turn to the east and south here.  You get the feeling you're being watched, but it might be due to all the stuffed, mounted animal parts on the wall.  Monstrous boars, various dangerous-looking monsters, and even some fish are mounted on wooden plaques all over the hall.  All kinds of animal horns decorate the chairs and furnishings.

East.description: You see ruby-red light streaming toward you.

South.description: The hall runs off to the south.

rooms.name: Skylights
rooms.description: Though this building is clearly very old and almost completely decayed, it's obvious that at one point it was a grand place.  The floor, which was once fine marble overlaid with rich red carpet, is now mostly rubble, but even so, you can easily see how once it had to be the most stunning fashion statement on the entire Caelian continet.  Overhead, broken glass hangs down in shards from what was once a beautiful skylight, letting in the weather.

East.description: You see red light streaming down from ruby-colored skylights, into a dark and forbidding hall.

West.description: The hall seems less ominous to the west.

rooms.name: An Eerie Red Chamber
rooms.description: This wide chamber seems awash and aglow in a creepy red light.  It seems to be coming down from some strangely intact ruby-red skylights installed in the ceiling.  The light colors everything in sight, making the entire area seem awash in blood.

South.description: You see a gigantic tree growing right in the middle of the chamber!

West.description: Through the deep ruby light, you can make out a grand hall.

rooms.name: A Massive Rhell Tree
rooms.description: How peculiar -- a tree is growing right out of the floor.  And this is no ordinary tree, but one of the mightiest rhell trees you've ever seen.  Its girth easily takes up almost the entire huge chamber, and it stretches so far overhead you can't see the top of it.  The room around it is almost completely dark, and your steps echo on the once-proud crumbling marble floor.

North.description: The chamber the tree is in extends to the north, toward the main building's corner.

West.description: The tree's bole is blocked by a bronze gate.

Up.description: You perceive a way to climb up the tree's trunk.

extras.text: The tree is easily the biggest, mightiest plant you've ever seen in your life. Oddly enough, though, someone's put a gate into its trunk, near the floor.

rooms.name: The Gamekeeper's War-Room
rooms.description: A broken and sagging wooden table of immense size and weight dominates this small chamber carved right into the bole of a tree.  Maps and scrolls adorn the table and various shelves up against the walls.  Though the table looks the worse for wear, the papers appear to be in very good shape.

East.description: A bronze gate blocks the exit from this chamber.

extras.text: The texts are ancient, clearly, and they are written on some kind of thick parchment. They all seem to have pictures of animals on them.

rooms.name: Among Twisted Treetops
rooms.description: These black, twisted trees seem almost dead.  They lack leaves, though you cannot see any leaves on the ground below, where brambles cruelly glisten, as if with malevolent intent.  The trees around you barely support your weight; they make the most horrifying cracking noises as you move around on them.

East.description: You can leap to another of the gnarled, blackened trees.

West.description: You can leap to another of the gnarled, blackened trees.

rooms.name: Among Twisted Treetops

The trees around you barely support your weight; they make the most horrifying cracking noises as you move around on them.

South.description: You can leap to another of the gnarled, blackened trees.

West.description: You can leap to another of the gnarled, blackened trees.

rooms.name: Among Twisted Treetops
rooms.description: These black, twisted trees seem almost dead.  They lack leaves, though you cannot see any leaves on the ground below, where brambles cruelly glisten, as if with malevolent intent.  The trees around you barely support your weight; they make the most horrifying cracking noises as you move around on them.  To the north a bit, you can see that the growth thickens somewhat.

North.description: A very large and misshapen black tree stands to the north. A tree limb extends toward it. You might be able to climb that way.

East.description: You can leap to another of the gnarled, blackened trees.

rooms.name: Up Against the Rhell Tree's Trunk
rooms.description: You clamber up a large tree limb and find yourself on the south side of a rather large rhell tree.  Its bark is rough but pleasant to look at, but you can see something rather unusual about it -- perhaps it's just how regular and aesthetic it is after all those ugly black trees.

North.description: There's nothing there, but the bark DOES look interesting..

extras.text: The bark seems to have a regularity to it that looks almost unnatural. Careful inspection of the tree's trunk reveals a little panel set into it.
The panel has a tiny little lock embedded into its surface. If you hadn't gone looking for it, you'd never have found it.

rooms.name: Up a Rhell Tree's Trunk
rooms.description: This tree seems majestic indeed.  It's tall, stately, infinitely dignified, and somehow very melancholy, if it's possible for a mere tree to seem that way. Below you, you can see its base, but it's not possible to see how high the tree reaches upward.  If you could fly, you could enter an empty space to the north, as well.

North.description: An open space seems very risky to attempt.

South.description: A panel is set into the tree's trunk right about here.

Down.description: Below you, you see the tree's base.

rooms.name: Above the Pool of Sorrows
rooms.description: You hover above a sedate little body of water.  The air here is damp and smells of decay.  Very large trees stand in all directions, each as magnificent as the last.

North.description: To the north you see another rhell tree's trunk.

East.description: To the east you see another rhell tree's trunk.

South.description: To the south you see another rhell tree's trunk.

West.description: To the west you see another rhell tree's trunk.

Down.description: Downward, you can see a dark and murky pool.

rooms.name: Up a Rhell Tree's Trunk
rooms.description: This tree seems majestic indeed.  It's tall, stately, infinitely dignified, and somehow very melancholy, if it's possible for a mere tree to seem that way. Below you, you can see its base, but it's not possible to see how high the tree reaches upward.  If you could fly, you could enter an empty space to the east, as well.

East.description: You see an empty space to the east.

Down.description: Below you, you see the tree's base.

Below you, you can see its base, but it's not possible to see how high the tree reaches upward.  If you could fly, you could enter an empty space to the south, as well.

South.description: You see an empty space to the south.

Down.description: Below you, you see the tree's base.

rooms.name: Up a Rhell Tree's Trunk
rooms.description: This tree seems majestic indeed.  It's tall, stately, infinitely dignified, and somehow very melancholy, if it's possible for a mere tree to seem that way. Below you, you can see its base, but it's not possible to see how high the tree reaches upward.  If you could fly, you could enter an empty space to the west, as well.

West.description: To the west you see an open space.

Down.description: Below you, you see the tree's base.

rooms.name: Treetops Near a Building
rooms.description: These large Rhell trees seem to stand guard over a large building to the south.  It might be a house, but it is difficult to tell with all the branches and leaves in the way.  Far to the north stand the smaller, more gnarled trees that mark this forest, and a huge, hideous bramble patch.

East.description: You can walk on the tree limbs to another rhell tree to the east.

Down.description: Downward, you can see the tree's base.

rooms.name: Treetops Near a Building
rooms.description: These large Rhell trees seem to stand guard over a large building to the south.  It might be a house, but it is difficult to tell with all the branches and leaves in the way.  Far to the north stand the smaller, more gnarled trees that mark this forest, and a huge, hideous bramble patch.

East.description: To the east, a tree limb connects with that of another rhell further on.

West.description: To the west, a tree limb twines with that of another rhell.

Down.description: Below, you can see the tree's base.

rooms.name: Treetops Near a Building
rooms.description: These large Rhell trees seem to stand guard over a large building to the south.  It might be a house, but it is difficult to tell with all the branches and leaves in the way.  Far to the north stand the smaller, more gnarled trees that mark this forest, and a huge, hideous bramble patch.

West.description: To the west, you can climb along tree limbs to reach another rhell.

Down.description: Below, you can see the tree's base.

rooms.name: Among Twisted Treetops
rooms.description: Up here, among the branches of the evil-looking twisted trees, you can't see very far.  In fact, not much is exposed at all.  The damp air reveals mostly more barren twigs and scratchy branches that tear at skin, clothes, fur, and hair - anything that is visible.  The unearthly quiet seems somehow very grim and malevolent.  The only way to get around is by prowling on the lower branches, jumping from tree to tree.

rooms.name: Among Twisted Treetops
rooms.description: Up here among the branches of the evil-looking twisted trees, it is difficult to see very far.  In fact, very little is visible at all.  The damp air reveals mostly barren twigs and scratchy branches that tear at skin and clothes.  The unearthly quiet seems somehow very grim and malevolent.

rooms.name: Among Twisted Treetops
rooms.description: Here the dark and evil-looking black trees cluster tightly together as though in defense against something.  Sharp, bare branches sway in the wind, threatening to slice unprotected skin.  Huge thorny brambles lie to the north and northeast of here.

East.description: There are more trees to the east. Beyond this, you can only see the bramble patches.

West.description: There are more trees to the west.

rooms.name: Among Twisted Treetops
rooms.description: A few gnarled trees cluster together near the edge of the twisted forest. Looking out through the trees, you can see clear air to the east and north, but it'd be not only stupid but impossible to try to gain passage in those directions, as an immense forest of brambles seems to extend to the horizons. The branches up at this height don't seem very sturdy, so it'd be wise not to dwell here too long.

South.description: There are more trees to the south.

West.description: There are more trees to the west.

rooms.name: Among Twisted Treetops
rooms.description: A few gnarled trees cluster together near the edge of the twisted forest. Looking out through the trees, you can see clear air to the east and north, but it'd be not only stupid but impossible to try to gain passage in those directions, as an immense forest of brambles seems to extend to the horizons. The branches up at this height don't seem very sturdy, so it'd be wise not to dwell here too long.

North.description: The tree branches twine with another tree's just to the north.

rooms.name: Among Twisted Treetops
rooms.description: A few gnarled trees cluster together near the edge of the twisted forest. Looking out through the trees, you can see clear air to the east and north, but it'd be not only stupid but impossible to try to gain passage in those directions, as an immense forest of brambles seems to extend to the horizons. The branches up at this height don't seem very sturdy, so it'd be wise not to dwell here too long.

South.description: The tree branches twine with another tree's just to the south.

North.description: The tree branches twine with another tree's just to the north.

South.description: The tree branches twine with another tree's just to the south.

rooms.name: Among Twisted Treetops
rooms.description: A few gnarled trees cluster together near the edge of the twisted forest. Looking out through the trees, you can see clear air to the east and north, but it'd be not only stupid but impossible to try to gain passage in those directions, as an immense forest of brambles seems to extend to the horizons. The branches up at this height don't seem very sturdy, so it'd be wise not to dwell here too long.

North.description: The tree branches twine with another tree's just to the north.

rooms.name: Among Twisted Treetops
rooms.description: A few twisted trees have twined together here, so it is fairly easy to climb up and down them.  The ground is some distance below, so a sure grip and steady movements would be advisable.  Briars grow below, ready to catch the unwary in a prickly grip.

rooms.name: Branches Above an Ancient Building
rooms.description: The thick branches of a pair of mighty Rhell trees cross here in midair. One tree is to the south, the other to the west.  Far below is the roof of a large building.  This spot is above the building's southwest corner.  Branches and debris cover the roof.  It is a wonder the building still stands.

rooms.name: Up Among the Rhell Trees
rooms.description: You find yourself in a stand of trees running north-south along the western edge of a large building.  You can't see much about the building, since the huge trunks and branches and leaves of the trees obscure it, but you do have a lovely view of the forest around you.  Rough brambles on the ground seem like they'd make passage painful, but you can climb down the tree you're currently on if you wish, or crawl along its thick limbs to another one.

South.description: Your tree's limbs twine with another's to the south.

rooms.name: Up Among the Rhell Trees
rooms.description: You find yourself in a stand of trees running north-south along the western edge of a large building.  You can't see much about the building, since the huge trunks and branches and leaves of the trees obscure it, but you do have a lovely view of the forest around you.  Rough brambles on the ground seem like they'd make passage painful, but you can climb down the tree you're currently on if you wish, or crawl along its thick limbs to another one.

North.description: Your tree's limbs twine with another's to the north.

South.description: Your tree's limbs twine with another's to the south.

Down.description: Below you, you see the tree's base.

rooms.name: Up Among the Rhell Trees
rooms.description: You find yourself in a stand of trees running north-south along the western edge of a large building.  You can't see much about the building, since the huge trunks and branches and leaves of the trees obscure it, but you do have a lovely view of the forest around you.  Rough brambles on the ground seem like they'd make passage painful, but you can climb down the tree you're currently on if you wish, or crawl along its thick limbs to another one.

North.description: Your tree's limbs twine with another's to the north.

Down.description: Below, you see the tree's base.

rooms.name: Up Among the Rhell Trees
rooms.description: This stand of rhell trees seems to guard the eastern end of a rather large building.  The trunk of this particular tree is quite impressive; you couldn't put your arms all the way around it, not by a long shot!  All around the evil black trees seem to crowd you, but here at least things are quiet and not so threatening.

South.description: The tree branches are so thick and twined you can walk on them!

Down.description: A sort of twisting, turning slide lies downward... It's all very confusing.

rooms.name: Up Among the Rhell Trees
rooms.description: This stand of rhell trees seems to guard the eastern end of a rather large building.  The trunk of this particular tree is quite impressive; you couldn't put your arms all the way around it, not by a long shot!  All around the evil black trees seem to crowd you, but here at least things are quiet and not so threatening.

North.description: The branches twine together, allowing you to walk across them.

South.description: The tree limbs twine together, making a sort of walkway.

West.description: A particularly large branch connects to a correspondingly large tree to the west.

rooms.name: Along a Large Tree Limb
rooms.description: This tree limb extends from a rhell tree directly to the west, connecting it to one just east of here.  The limb is quite sturdy, though it sways in a very alarming manner as you cross.  The tree to the west is one of the biggest you've ever seen!

East.description: The tree limb intersects with other tree limbs.

West.description: An open knothole reveals the interior of the tree.

rooms.name: In the Heart of the Bole
rooms.description: This part of the tree is hollow, though above your head it seems to close back up again.  You climg to the fragments of bark and wood that were once part of the living tree, before some disaster rent it in two.  It smells faintly of fire here, but the evidences of it -- charcoaled edges of the trunk and soot -- are all quite old.  You can clamber down toward a table below if you wish.

East.description: A knothole leads out onto a large tree limb.

Down.description: You can climb down the inside of the tree.

rooms.name: Up Among the Rhell Trees
rooms.description: This stand of rhell trees seems to guard the eastern end of a rather large building.  The trunk of this particular tree is quite impressive; you couldn't put your arms all the way around it, not by a long shot!  All around the evil black trees seem to crowd you, but here at least things are quiet and not so threatening.

North.description: Tree limbs are thick enough to walk on here.

Down.description: You can shimmy down the trunk of this tree here.

rooms.name: Up Among Rhell Trees
rooms.description: This little grove of massive rhell trees guards the southern end of a rather large building that stands just north of here.  Each tree is quite large and obviously very old.  The branches and leaves of each one are all very thick and healthy-looking, a stark contrast to those of the sickeningly twisted black trees everywhere else around here.  Alas, there are few visible ways out of here.

East.description: Your tree's limbs twine with another's to the east.

Down.description: Below you, you can see the tree's base.

rooms.name: Up Among the Rhell Trees
rooms.description: This little grove of massive rhell trees guards the southern end of a rather large building that stands just north of here.  Each tree is quite large and obviously very old.  The branches and leaves of each one are all very thick and healthy-looking, a stark contrast to those of the sickeningly twisted black trees everywhere else around here.  Alas, there are few visible ways out of here.

East.description: Your tree's limbs twine with another's to the east.

West.description: Your tree's limbs twine with another's to the west.

Down.description: Below, you can see the tree's base.

rooms.name: Up Among the Rhell Trees
rooms.description: This little grove of massive rhell trees guards the southern end of a rather large building that stands just north of here.  Each tree is quite large and obviously very old.  The branches and leaves of each one are all very thick and healthy-looking, a stark contrast to those of the sickeningly twisted black trees everywhere else around here.  Alas, there are few visible ways out of here.

West.description: To the west, you see the tree's limbs twining with another's.

Down.description: Downward, a twisty turny sort of slide leads out of sight..

rooms.name: The Twisted Forest
rooms.description: This obscenely malevolent forest is composed of the most gnarled and misshapen trees you've ever seen.  There appears to be some fire damage to the trees' trunks, but there aren't any signs or scents of a fire anytime recently. Oddly, none of the branches in sight seem to have any leaves.

East.description: The forest extends eastward.

West.description: The forest extends westward.

rooms.name: The Twisted Forest
rooms.description: This obscenely malevolent forest is composed of the most gnarled and misshapen trees you've ever seen.  There appears to be some fire damage to the trees' trunks, but there aren't any signs or scents of a fire anytime recently. Oddly, none of the branches in sight seem to have any leaves.

South.description: The forest extends southward.

West.description: The forest extends westward.

rooms.name: The Twisted Forest
rooms.description: This obscenely malevolent forest is composed of the most gnarled and misshapen trees you've ever seen.  There appears to be some fire damage to the trees' trunks, but there aren't any signs or scents of a fire anytime recently. Oddly, none of the branches in sight seem to have any leaves.

North.description: The forest extends northward, ending in front of a grove of rather large trees.

East.description: The forest extends eastward.
